channel.title: Ahead Of Their Time
channel.description: In sports, we love to celebrate the stars who usher in game-changing new strategies and skills. But often times, they weren't the first to champion these winning tactics. This mini-series from FiveThirtyEight's "Hot Takedown" profiles some of the most innovative and under-appreciated players and managers in the history of sport.
channel.itunes:subtitle: In sports, we love to celebrate the stars who usher in game-changing new strategies and skills. But often times, they weren't the first to champion these winning tactics. This mini-series from FiveThirtyEight's "Hot Takedown" profiles some of the most innovative and under-appreciated players and managers in the history of sport.
channel.itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Jody Avirgan
channel.itunes:summary: In sports, we love to celebrate the stars who usher in game-changing new strategies and skills. But often times, they weren't the first to champion these winning tactics. channel.content:encoded: In sports, we love to celebrate the stars who usher in game-changing new strategies and skills. But often times, they weren't the first to champion these winning tactics. This mini-series from FiveThirtyEight's "Hot Takedown" profiles some of the most innovative and under-appreciated players and managers in the history of sport.

item.title: Ahead Of Their Time - Randall Cunningham
item.description: Our series concludes with the "ultimate weapon," Randall Cunningham of the Philadelphia Eagles, who could do it all before anyone knew what to do with someone like him.
item.itunes:title: Ahead Of Their Time - Randall Cunningham
item.itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Jody Avirgan
item.itunes:subtitle: Our series concludes with the "ultimate weapon," Randall Cunningham of the Philadelphia Eagles, who could do it all before anyone knew what to do with someone like him.

item.content:encoded: Our series concludes with the "ultimate weapon," Randall Cunningham of the Philadelphia Eagles, who could do it all before anyone knew what to do with someone like him.

item.title: Ahead Of Their Time - The Two-Handed Backhand
item.description: The story of Peaches Bartkowicz, Chris Evert, and the rise of a new way to hit the tennis ball. Reported by Emma Morgenstern.
item.itunes:title: Ahead Of Their Time - The Two-Handed Backhand
item.itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Jody Avirgan
item.itunes:subtitle: The story of Peaches Bartkowicz, Chris Evert, and the rise of a new way to hit the tennis ball. Reported by Emma Morgenstern.
item.itunes:summary: The story of Peaches Bartkowicz, Chris Evert, and the rise of a new way to hit the tennis ball. Reported by Emma Morgenstern.
item.content:encoded: The story of Peaches Bartkowicz, Chris Evert, and the rise of a new way to hit the tennis ball. Reported by Emma Morgenstern.

item.title: Ahead Of Their Time - Long Ball Soccer
item.description: Charles Reep pioneered soccer analytics, invented the long ball style, and helped ruin the English national team for a generation. Reported and produced by Joe Sykes.
item.itunes:title: Ahead Of Their Time - Long Ball Soccer
item.itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Jody Avirgan
item.itunes:subtitle: Charles Reep pioneered soccer analytics, invented the long ball style, and helped ruin the English national team for a generation. Reported and produced by Joe Sykes.
item.itunes:summary: Charles Reep pioneered soccer analytics, invented the long ball style, and helped ruin the English national team for a generation. Reported and produced by Joe Sykes.
item.content:encoded: Charles Reep pioneered soccer analytics, invented the long ball style, and helped ruin the English national team for a generation. Reported and produced by Joe Sykes.

item.title: Ahead Of Their Time - Russians In The NHL
item.description: How Mike Smith, the Russia-obsessed coach of the Winnipeg Jets, changed the NHL forever. Part two of our five-part doc series, hosted by Neil Paine.
item.itunes:title: Ahead Of Their Time - Russians In The NHL
item.itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Jody Avirgan
item.itunes:subtitle: How Mike Smith, the Russia-obsessed coach of the Winnipeg Jets, changed the NHL forever. Part two of our five-part doc series, hosted by Neil Paine.

item.content:encoded: How Mike Smith, the Russia-obsessed coach of the Winnipeg Jets, changed the NHL forever. Part two of our five-part doc series, hosted by Neil Paine.

item.title: Ahead Of Their Time - The Shift
item.description: Neil Paine tells the story of the rise, fall, and return of the defensive shift in baseball, which stumped Hall of Famer Ted Williams. The first in our five-part doc series.
item.itunes:title: Ahead Of Their Time - The Shift
item.itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Jody Avirgan
item.itunes:subtitle: Neil Paine tells the story of the rise, fall, and return of the defensive shift in baseball, which stumped Hall of Famer Ted Williams. The first in our five-part doc series.
